import { useContext } from "react" import { CartContext } from "../../context/cart.context" import Button from "../button/button.component" import "./product-card.styles.scss" const ProductCard =({product})=>{ const {addItemToCart}=useContext(CartContext) const {name, price, imageUrl} = product return(
{name} $ {price}
) } export default ProductCard
